description: Cisco DNA Center Network Operations Center Dashboard. Added Eisenhower Executive Office Building to site health.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Lab_total_ordinaria as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Socratives as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  T0+T1+T2 as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  pei as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Nota_final_ordinaria as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Nota_final as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Total_sesiones_Trabajadas as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

panels.description: Numero de veces en el que el individuo a asistido a clase, hemos puesto como maximo 22 porque es el numero maximo de clases que se han impartido

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Total_sesiones as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

panels.title: Total de sesiones de asistencia

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time_sec,
  Student_ID as metric,
  Total_minutos as value
FROM EC.GrupoE
ORDER BY Student_ID

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  scoreDetail
FROM client_health
WHERE
  category LIKE 'ALL'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  networkHealthRouter AS 'Router'
FROM site_health
WHERE
  siteName LIKE 'Washington DC'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  networkHealthRouter
FROM site_health
WHERE
  siteName LIKE 'Tech Center'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  networkHealthRouter
FROM site_health
WHERE
  siteName LIKE 'Mercy Medical Center'
ORDER BY datetime

SELECT
  datetime AS "time",
  networkHealthRouter
FROM site_health
WHERE
  siteName LIKE 'San Jose'
ORDER BY datetime

title: Grupo_E
